title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the State of the Union Address | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
January 18, 2010

 



Statement from the Press Secretary on the State of the Union Address




The President will deliver the 2010 State of the Union address to a joint session of Congress on Wednesday, January 27th, 2010 at 9:00PM EST. The address will be broadcast live on national television and will be streamed live on obamawhitehouse.archives.gov.
